4304.verse: وَمِنْ|And among|93|104|1133$ءَايَـٰتِهِ|His Signs|79|100|706$ٱلْجَوَارِ|(are) the ships|118|139|15393$فِى|in|48|69|89$ٱلْبَحْرِ|the sea,|75|96|1421$كَٱلْأَعْلَـٰمِ|like [the] mountains.|157|168|15394$

4305.verse: إِن|If|44|52|225$يَشَأْ|He wills,|74|91|4532$يُسْكِنِ ٱلرِّيحَ|He can cause the wind to become still|274|291|15395$فَيَظْلَلْنَ|then they would remain|176|193|15396$رَوَاكِدَ|motionless|89|98|15397$عَلَىٰ|on|63|76|52$ظَهْرِهِۦٓ‌ۚ|its back.|89|114|15398$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|95|58$فِى|in|48|73|89$ذَٲلِكَ|that|64|89|28$لَأَيَـٰتٍ|surely (are) Signs|137|162|1434$لِّكُلِّ|for everyone|104|116|3746$صَبَّارٍ|patient|78|318|9523$شَكُورٍ|(and) grateful.|117|357|9524$

4306.verse: أَوْ|Or|41|52|154$يُوبِقْهُنَّ|He could destroy them|170|193|15399$بِمَا|for what|76|99|43$كَسَبُواْ|they have earned;|143|166|1788$وَيَعْفُ|but He pardons|121|144|15400$عَن|[from]|61|72|1105$كَثِيرٍ|much.|65|65|4453$

4307.verse: وَيَعْلَمَ|And may know|116|123|3319$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|102|20$يُجَـٰدِلُونَ|dispute|101|114|9381$فِىٓ|concerning|92|106|89$ءَايَـٰتِنَا|Our Signs|83|96|1344$مَا|(that) not|87|100|262$لَهُم|for them|76|83|98$مِّن|any|50|300|53$مَّحِيصٍ|place of refuge.|125|375|9583$

4308.verse: فَمَآ|So whatever|104|112|132$أُوتِيتُم|you are given|110|126|3007$مِّن|of|50|66|53$شَىْءٍ|a thing,|71|87|186$فَمَتَـٰعُ|(is) but a passing enjoyment|210|226|13495$ٱلْحَيَوٲةِ|(for) the life|101|109|817$ٱلدُّنْيَا‌ۖ|(of) the world.|117|123|818$وَمَا|But what|80|92|46$عِندَ|(is) with|75|87|521$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|65|606$خَيْرٌ|(is) better|88|100|520$وَأَبْقَىٰ|and more lasting|129|141|11521$لِلَّذِينَ|for those who|112|118|750$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|132|84$وَعَلَىٰ|and upon|81|180|67$رَبِّهِمْ|their Lord|83|182|54$يَتَوَكَّلُونَ|put (their) trust.|131|181|7134$

4309.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|128|42$يَجْتَنِبُونَ|avoid|100|119|15401$كَبَـٰٓئِرَ|(the) greater|107|126|3936$ٱلْإِثْمِ|sins|60|79|4728$وَٱلْفَوَٲحِشَ|and the immoralities,|157|176|15402$وَإِذَا مَا|and when|88|97|7993$غَضِبُواْ|they are angry,|123|224|15403$هُمْ|they|50|253|49$يَغْفِرُونَ|forgive,|96|198|15404$

4310.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|127|42$ٱسْتَجَابُواْ|respond|105|120|3507$لِرَبِّهِمْ|to their Lord|102|117|12348$وَأَقَامُواْ|and establish|107|122|2490$ٱلصَّلَوٲةَ|prayer|91|106|38$وَأَمْرُهُمْ|and their affairs|125|133|15405$شُورَىٰ|(are conducted by) consultation|235|250|15406$بَيْنَهُمْ|among them,|106|136|1056$وَمِمَّا|and from what|116|146|39$رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ|We have provided them|177|192|40$يُنفِقُونَ|they spend,|99|99|41$

4312.verse: وَجَزَٲٓؤُاْ|(The) recompense|141|157|15408$سَيِّئَةٍ|(of) an evil|93|125|4226$سَيِّئَةٌ|(is) an evil|90|122|3221$مِّثْلُهَا‌ۖ|like it.|68|100|15409$فَمَنْ|But whoever|103|135|402$عَفَا|pardons|72|88|3382$وَأَصْلَحَ|and makes reconciliation,|187|198|4958$فَأَجْرُهُۥ|then his reward|123|146|15410$عَلَى|(is) on|63|86|52$ٱللَّهِ‌ۚ|Allah.|56|79|606$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, He|92|115|396$لَا|(does) not|90|101|30$يُحِبُّ|like|68|308|1712$ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|the wrongdoers.|128|368|377$

4313.verse: وَلَمَنِ|And surely whosoever|165|174|15411$ٱنتَصَرَ|defends himself|122|139|15412$بَعْدَ|after|52|69|1117$ظُلْمِهِۦ|he has been wronged,|167|184|4957$فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|then those|92|109|777$مَا|not|42|50|262$عَلَيْهِم|(is) against them|133|239|22$مِّن|any|50|262|53$سَبِيلٍ|way.|69|175|4020$

4315.verse: وَلَمَن|And whoever|106|124|15414$صَبَرَ|(is) patient|94|131|15415$وَغَفَرَ|and forgives,|106|143|15416$إِنَّ|indeed,|68|105|58$ذَٲلِكَ|that|64|101|28$لَمِنْ|(is) surely of|104|122|15417$عَزْمِ ٱلْأُمُورِ|matters of determination.|189|189|3590$

4316.verse: وَمَن|And whoever|106|113|1012$يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ|Allah lets go astray|148|162|4277$فَمَا|then not|77|91|132$لَهُۥ|for him|65|79|977$مِن|any|50|64|53$وَلِىٍّ|protector|82|96|1006$مِّنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ‌ۗ|after Him.|112|119|504$وَتَرَى|And you will see|127|133|5095$ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|the wrongdoers,|128|141|377$لَمَّا|when|55|68|3471$رَأَوُاْ|they see|78|91|8193$ٱلْعَذَابَ|the punishment|122|135|1442$يَقُولُونَ|saying,|88|101|753$هَلْ|`Is|50|56|1829$إِلَىٰ|(there) for|90|158|118$مَرَدٍّ|return|60|195|15418$مِّن|any|50|185|53$سَبِيلٍ|way?`|69|137|4020$

4304.verse: And of His signs are the ships in the sea, like mountains.

4305.verse: If He willed, He could still the wind, and they would remain motionless on its surface. Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.

4306.verse: Or He could destroy them for what they earned; but He pardons much.

4307.verse: And [that is so] those who dispute concerning Our signs may know that for them there is no place of escape.

4308.verse: So whatever thing you have been given - it is but [for] enjoyment of the worldly life. But what is with Allah is better and more lasting for those who have believed and upon their Lord rely

4309.verse: And those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, and when they are angry, they forgive,

4310.verse: And those who have responded to their lord and established prayer and whose affair is [determined by] consultation among themselves, and from what We have provided them, they spend.

4311.verse: And those who, when tyranny strikes them, they defend themselves,

4312.verse: And the retribution for an evil act is an evil one like it, but whoever pardons and makes reconciliation - his reward is [due] from Allah. Indeed, He does not like wrongdoers.

4313.verse: And whoever avenges himself after having been wronged - those have not upon them any cause [for blame].

4314.verse: The cause is only against the ones who wrong the people and tyrannize upon the earth without right. Those will have a painful punishment.

4315.verse: And whoever is patient and forgives - indeed, that is of the matters [requiring] determination.

4316.verse: And he whom Allah sends astray - for him there is no protector beyond Him. And you will see the wrongdoers, when they see the punishment, saying, "Is there for return [to the former world] any way?"
